thread.title: Sia was all smiles as she went wig-less through LAX
thread.title_full: Sia was all smiles as she went wig-less through LAX

author: Kayla Bazile
title: Sia was all smiles as she went wig-less through LAX
text:
Nice to see you again, Sia 's face!
The usually private singer shocked photographers as she walked through LAX Thursday, without wearing her usual, face-covering wig. While she made her way to catch a flight to Dubai, the paparazzi were quick to take pictures of her seldom-seen punim.
SEE ALSO: Sia's adorable 'Alive' video star shows off her badass martial arts skills
Sia goes wig-less & shows her face while heading to Dubai https://t.co/rUODnjzIN4 pic.twitter.com/CpIh1nMpod
— billboard (@billboard) March 23, 2017
The "Elastic Heart" singer previously explained her desire to hide her face when she appeared in James Corden's "Carpool Karaoke." As a recovering alcohol and drug addict, Sia found herself getting increasingly famous due to her talent and she found it "destabilizing."
Fans expressed encouragement and, er, other sentiments, about Sia's decision to go wig-less.
SIA REALLY DID THAT pic.twitter.com/ABgHcfOXbG
— ️️ (@slutIenas) March 23, 2017
If you're wondering why Sia has been photographed without her wig, it's because she had to create a decoy to escape Beyoncé's basement. pic.twitter.com/xh8FUbK9uC
— Josh (@J_Manasa) March 23, 2017
when will showing your face be newsworthy? https://t.co/t7qdVZZXfI
— Christian Zamora (@Christian_Zamo) March 23, 2017
now u Sia now u don't pic.twitter.com/2VUARse4tg
— em (@emiliethomasx) March 23, 2017
sia showing her face is already the best thing to happen in 2017
— brady (@icebrady) March 23, 2017
I too am wig-less after looking at these photos https://t.co/exR0p0gzTv
— Jon Adams (@prasejeebus) March 23, 2017
